org.mobilesynergies.android.epic.service.remoteui
Class RemoteUserInterfaceActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      org.mobilesynergies.android.epic.service.administration.ServiceAdministrationActivity
          org.mobilesynergies.android.epic.service.remoteui.RemoteUserInterfaceActivity

public class RemoteUserInterfaceActivity
extends ServiceAdministrationActivity

Activity that converts a ParameterMap to a user interface. Can be used to execute a remote command.

protected void onConnected()
Description copied from class: ServiceAdministrationActivity
This method has to be implemented to get informed when the activity successfully connected to the administrative interface of the epic service. It is called when the service is ready to interact with the activity.
